__un_used_tip__: This language file use ai translation, may have some errors, please help to improve it.
showPlotTip: Whether to show the bottom territory prompt
allowMonsterDamage: Allow hostile mobs to take damage
allowPassiveDamage: Allow passive and neutral mobs to take damage
allowSpecialDamage: Allow special entities (boats, minecarts, paintings, etc.) to take damage
allowLiquidFlow: Allow external liquid to flow into the territory
此命令仅限 {} 使用!: This command is only available for {}!
未找到任何玩家，请确保玩家在线后重试: No players found. Ensure they are online and try again.
{} 已经是管理员，请不要重复添加: {} is already an admin. Do not add repeatedly.
{} 已经被添加为管理员: {} has been added as an admin.
{} 已经被移除管理员: {} has been removed as an admin.
{} 不是管理员，无需移除: {} is not an admin. No need to remove.
您还没有开启领地选区，请先使用 /pland new 命令: You have not started a plot selection. Use /pland new first.
领地系统配置加载失败，请检查配置文件: Failed to load plot system config. Check config files.
您当前不在领地内: You are not inside a plot.
您不是领地主人，无法设置传送点: You are not the plot owner. Cannot set teleport point.
你所在的维度无法购买领地: Cannot purchase plots in this dimension.
请选择领地维度\n\n2D: 领地拥有整个Y轴\n3D: 自行选择Y轴范围:
Select dimension:

2D: Full Y-axis
3D: Custom Y-axis range
选区功能已开启，使用命令 /pland set 或使用 {} 来选择ab点: Selection enabled. Use /pland set or {} to pick points.
请先使用 /pland new 来选择领地: Use /pland new to start plot selection.
领地体积过大，无法购买: Plot volume too large. Cannot purchase.
领地范围不合法, 可用范围: 长宽: {}~{} 最小高度: {}, 当前长宽高: Invalid plot range. Allowed: Length/Width {}-{}, Min Height {}. Current: {}x{}x{}
领地重叠，与领地 {} 冲突，请重新选择: Plot overlap, conflicts with plot {}. Reselect.
领地范围不合法, 可用范围: 长宽: {}~{} 最小高度: {}: Invalid plot range. Allowed: Length/Width {}-{}, Min Height {}.
经济系统异常,退还差价失败: Economy error. Failed to refund difference.
确认选区的Y轴范围\n您可以在此调节Y轴范围，如果不需要修改，请直接点击提交:
Confirm Y-axis range.
Adjust below or submit directly.
请输入正确的Y轴范围, 开始Y轴必须小于结束Y轴: Invalid Y-axis. Start must be less than End.
欢迎使用 Pland 领地管理插件\n\n请选择一个功能:
Welcome to PLand

Select a function:
您确定要删除领地 {} 吗?\n删除领地后，您将获得 {} 金币的退款。\n此操:
Delete plot {}?
Refund: {} coins.
This is irreversible!
您确定要将领地转让给 {} 吗?\n转让后，您将失去此领地的权限。\n此操作不可:
Transfer plot to {}?
You will lose access.
Irreversible!
重新选区为完全重新选择领地的范围，非直接扩充/缩小现有领地范围。\n重新选择的价:
Reselecting replaces the entire area.
Cost: New price - Old value. Continue?
无权限访问此表单: No permission to access this form.
使用 /pland set a 或使用 {} 选择点A: Use /pland set a or {} to select Point A.
使用 /pland set b 或使用 {} 选择点B: Use /pland set b or {} to select Point B.
使用 /pland buy 呼出购买菜单: Use /pland buy to open purchase menu.
system: 为使用当前客户端语言\nserver: 为使用服务端语言:
system: To use the current client language
server: To use the server language
选区开启失败，当前存在未完成的选区任务: The selection area activation failed. There are currently unfinished selection area tasks.
当前位置没有领地: There is no land at the current location.
当前位置不是你的领地: The current location is not your land.
子领地功能未启用，请联系管理员: The sub-land function is not enabled. Please contact the administrator.
当前领地无法创建子领地: Sub-land cannot be created in the current land.
当前为子领地模式，子领地的Y轴范围不能超过父领地。\n父领地Y轴范围: {} ~:
It is currently in the sub-land mode. The Y-axis range of the sub-land cannot exceed that of the parent land.
Parent land Y-axis range: {} ~ {}
请输入正确的Y轴范围, 子领地的Y轴范围不能超过父领地: Please enter the correct Y-axis range. The Y-axis range of the sub-land cannot exceed that of the parent land.
子领地不在父领地范围内: The sub-land is not within the range of the parent land
父领地ID: {}\n父领地名称: {}:
Parent land ID: {}
Parent land name: {}
您当前操作的的是父领地\n当前领地下有 {} 个子领地\n您确定要删除领地吗?: You are currently operating on the parent land. There are {} sub-territories under the current land. Are you sure you want to delete the land?
删除当前领地和子领地: Delete the current land and sub-territories
删除领地失败，原因: {}: Failed to delete the land. Reason: {}
删除当前领地并提升子领地为父领地: Delete the current land and promote the sub-land to the parent land
您当前操作的的是混合领地\n当前领地下有 {} 个子领地\n您确定要删除领地吗?: You are currently operating on the mixed land. There are {} sub-territories under the current land. Are you sure you want to delete the land?
删除当前领地并移交子领地给父领地: Delete the current land and transfer the sub-territories to the parent land
领地传送点已设置!: Territory teleport point has been set!
目标玩家已离线，无法继续操作!: The target player is offline and cannot continue the operation!
此区域禁止创建领地，请重新选择: This area is forbidden for plot creation. Please reselect.
此区域禁止修改领地范围，请重新选择: This area is forbidden for plot modification. Please reselect.
此区域禁止创建子领地，请重新选择: This area is forbidden for sub-plot creation. Please reselect.
